pages.text: The first important thing on your way to the $(thing)End$() are $(item)Eyes of Ender$(). $(br2)You can craft them with $(item)Ender Pearls$() which you get from $(thing)Endermen$() or from bartering in the $(thing)Nether$() and $(item)Blaze Dust$() which you also get in the $(thing)Nether$() from $(thing)Blazes$().

The next step is to find a $(thing)Stronghold$(). $(br2)You can find one by throwing $(item)Eyes of Ender$() in the air, they will fly straight in the direction of the $(thing)Stronghold$(). $(br)If they stop and burst in mid-air, it's underneath.
Locate the $(thing)End Portal$() and fill in the empty frame blocks with $(item)Eyes of Ender$().
Before you go through the portal, make sure you have everything with you, once you go through you can't go back until you defeat the $(thing)Ender Dragon$() (the endboss of Minecraft) or die.
